#summary How to use the Eraser tool.

= Eraser =

You can use this tool to freehand erase lines or erase single pixels.

  # Press with the left mouse button.
  # Drag the mouse to erase.
  # Release the mouse button.

== Note ==

If the layer you are using is a background layer, the eraser tool will use the background color. If the layer is not a background layer, the eraser tool will use transparency. 

== Cancel ==

You can cancel the operation pressing the right button before you release the left one.

==Keyboard Shortcut==
`E`
